Package model

Class ModelManager

java.lang.Object
model.ModelManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
Model, utility.observer.listener.GeneralListener<Object,Object>, utility.observer.listener.LocalListener<Object,Object>, utility.observer.subject.GeneralSubject<Object,Object>, utility.observer.subject.LocalSubject<Object,Object>
public class ModelManager extends Object implements Model, utility.observer.listener.LocalListener<Object,Object>
A facade exposing methods to be used by clients of this application. This is also a LocalSubject in an observer pattern that can be used by LocalListeners to subscribe to changes and receive updates automatically, as part of the whole MVVM application model.
Version:
1.4.0 - May 2024
Author:
Alexandru Tofan, Supendra Bogati, Lucia Andronic

    • addListener

      public boolean addListener(utility.observer.listener.GeneralListener<Object,Object> listener, String... propertyNames)
      Add a local listener to this local subject.
      Specified by:
      addListener in interface utility.observer.subject.GeneralSubject<Object,Object>
      Specified by:
      addListener in interface utility.observer.subject.LocalSubject<Object,Object>
      Parameters:
      listener - the listener to be added
      propertyNames - a var-args list of property names. If empty, then the listener should be added as a lister for all events.
      Returns:
      true if the listener has been added. It is optional if this return true if the listener has been added to at least one of the property names or if it successfully has been added to all listed
      See Also:
      • LocalSubject
